Professor Gerich is always friendly and nice. Professor gave us a lot of freedom when it comes to essay writing, students are able to express their ideas by words in the class. Lecture class is always full of happiness!

Dave's class is my favorite in NCCU.
You can definitely learn a lot from his class!
大為是我遇過最最最好的老師之一，一步一步帶我們從段落擴展到文章、從日常深入到學術，他真的很用心，課程規劃非常有條理而且縝密，每堂課都收穫滿滿，沒有一秒鐘被浪費掉的課，很推薦想要考托福或雅思的同學選修！
